comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "MAILMEN'S MOTOR SCOOTERS - These are the new scooters, just received, that Tallahassee mailmen will be using to deliver mail as soon as a brief driver training program can be completed. Only eight have arrived but the rest of the [allotted] 20 is expected soon. Looking them over, left to right, are George Stout, Scooter dealer; J.W. Richardson, a mail carrier and future rider; Leo Stephens, Post Office regional representative, and Dick Sutton, assistant superintendent of mails."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 30738986@N06
comment._content: Wonder what the mailmen thought of their new transport?
